inclusion.criterion: Patient receiving oral cancer chemotherapy or oral hormone therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: delivered in community pharmacy for the treatment of cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-opposition to participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 60-year-old Spanish man with COPD, presenting with shortness of breath. He smokes 20 cigarettes per day and has a BMI of 40.
